wikipedia_page.main: Richard Field (2 August 1891 – 15 July 1965) was an English footballer who played for Sunderland, Dumbarton, Norwich City and  Grimsby Town.

response: *Richard Field (printer) (1561–1624), English printer and publisher, best known for his close association with the poems of William Shakespeare
*Richard Field (theologian) (1561–1616), English ecclesiological theologian associated with the work of Richard Hooker
*Richard Field (politician) (1866–1961), member of the Tasmanian Parliament
*Richard Field (judge) (born 1947), judge of the High Court of England and Wales
